comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content:
The photograph is taken off Kurraba Point and shows in the background the Manly Ferry servicing facilities established at that location. This photo, taken by Kerry Photos, shows the Port Jackson annd Manly Ferry Company's facilities from the point itself.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/63385174@N06/6149042051/]

comment._content: would have been a nice photo of a Manly ferry if those two dinghies hadn't got in the way :-)
